buildCommand: npx prisma generate && node -e "process.env.PRISMA_ENGINES_CHECKSUM_IGNORE_MISSING='1'; require('./scripts/build-info.js')" && node scripts/prisma-vercel.js && node scripts/prepare-vercel.js && node scripts/build/prisma-fix.js && node scripts/build/fix-auth-build.js --build && node scripts/pre-build-fix.js && next build && node scripts/fix-route-types.js && node scripts/build/vercel-build.js
installCommand: npm install && npm install --save-dev @types/node && npx prisma generate
